src_original: namaḥ suvarṇavarṇaprabhāya tathāagatāya /  namaḥ siṃhavikrīḍītarājāya tathāgatāya /
namaḥ śikhine tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya /
namaḥ krakucchandāya tathāgatāya /  namaḥ kanakamunaye tathagatāya /
namaḥ kāśyapāya tathāgatāyā /  namaḥ śākyamunaye tathagatāryārhate samyaksambuddhāya // tadyathā //
om same same mahāsame rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvānāṃca sarvapāpaprasamane svāhā // // //
sarvasattvān paripūraka /  sarvasattvasamā svāsanakarāya namo stute svāhā //
yamāya svāhā /  vijayāya svāhā /  jaya vijayāya svāhā /
om raṇa raṇa om phaṭ svāhā /
oṃ jupi svāhā /  oṃ jaya svāhā /
oṃ hrīḥ trailokyavijayāmoghapāśapratihata hrīṃ haḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
